description: Repository interface for managing BeaconOfferEntity entities, providing methods for data access related to beacon offers within the airport facility service platform.

classes.name: BeaconOfferRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for BeaconOfferEntity, providing CRUD operations and custom query methods.

methods.name: findByBeaconIdAndActive
methods.description: Retrieves a list of BeaconOfferEntity objects filtered by beacon ID and active status.
